participant_1.background:
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.
i just graduated from high school.
my mom is a cancer survivor.
My days are spent working, exercising, and trying to balance my work and family life.
i have a garden.

participant_2.background:
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
i am in a lot of debt.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
i have a dog that has behavioral issues.
I grew up as an only child and did not know much about my family until I was an adult.

content.text: Hi, I'm [user 1 name]. How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks for asking! Just got back from a walk with my parakeet. How about you?
My day is going well too! I just finished my garden. I love gardening.
That's great! I wish I had a green thumb. I'm a knitter, though, so I make my own clothes.
Knitting is awesome! I wish I could knit. I'm not much of a crafter.
That's okay, there's plenty of other things to do. I love going for walks with my parakeet. He's a great companion.
I'm glad you have a good friend in your parakeet. I'm an only child, so I know how important it is to have someone to talk to.
I grew up as an only child too, but I've always had a lot of friends. I'm not sure what I would do without them.
I'm glad you have such a good support system. I have a few close friends, but I'm not always sure how they feel about me.
I'm sure they care about you, even if you don't always hear it. I know I care about my friends, even if I don't always say it.
Thanks for saying that. It means a lot to me.
You're welcome! I'm always here to talk if you need someone.
